timeline.message:
Stop exposing ExecutorService from DeterministicTaskQueue

There are no real users of `DeterministicTaskQueue#getExecutorService()` so we
can remove those public methods and expose the `ExecutorService` only through
the corresponding `ThreadPool`.

timeline.bodyText: No loss of coverage since we also have testThreadPoolEnqueuesTasks().
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

timeline.bodyText: No loss of coverage since we also have testThreadPoolWrapsRunnable
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
